title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
Introducing the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case in vibrant orange! This all-in-one tool set is perfect for small repairs and DIY projects, making it a must-have for both DIY amateurs and avid handymen.

With a tool count of 39, this tool set includes essential items such as a hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, and a tape measure. The tools are made with heat-treated and chrome-plated material finish, ensuring durability and corrosion resistance for long-lasting use.

The plastic toolbox storage case is not only sturdy but also serves as an excellent organizer, with tool compartments to keep everything in its place. This feature makes it easy to find the right tool when you need it, saving you time and effort.

Portability is a breeze with this tool set, thanks to its lightweight design and convenient carrying handle. Whether you're working in your garage, basement, or even taking it on the go, this tool set is always ready to assist you.
